sense.gloss: to pull out, to take out, to draw out
to lead out (e.g. a horse from a stable), to summon (e.g. to court), to bring (e.g. someone to the negotiating table), to drag

to bring out (talent, potential, beauty, flavour, etc.), to extract (information, the truth, etc.), to get (e.g. an answer out of someone), to obtain (e.g. a result), to elicit, to draw (a conclusion), to derive (e.g. pleasure)
to get (money) out of someone, to coax out of someone, to get someone to pay, to make someone produce (funds)

sdata.j: ↑我々↑↓われわれ↓は↑勉強↑↓べんきょう↓からさらに↑楽↑↓たの↓しみを↑引↑↓|ひ↓き↑出↑↓だ↓す|。
sdata.e: We derive further pleasure from our study.

sdata.j: ↑人生↑↓じんせい↓とは↑不十分↑↓ふじゅうぶん↓な↑前提↑↓ぜんてい↓から↑十分↑↓じゅうぶん↓な↑結論↑↓けつろん↓を↑引↑↓|ひ↓き↑出↑↓だ↓す|↑技術↑↓ぎじゅつ↓である。
sdata.e: Life is the art of drawing sufficient conclusions from insufficient premises.

sdata.j: ↑読書↑↓どくしょ↓から↑楽↑↓たの↓しみを↑引↑↓|ひ↓き↑出↑↓だ↓す|のは↑読者↑↓どくしゃ↓↑次第↑↓しだい↓です。
sdata.e: It's the reader that determines whether they extract pleasure from reading.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓のいいところを↑引↑↓|ひ↓き↑出↑↓だ↓す|ようにしなさい。
sdata.e: Try to bring out the best in him.

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓からその↑秘密↑↓ひみつ↓を↑引↑↓|ひ↓き↑出↑↓だ↓す|だろう。↑今↑↓いま↓すぐ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓に↑打↑↓う↓ち↑明↑↓あ↓けた↑方↑↓ほう↓がいい。
sdata.e: She will worm the secret out of him. I had better trust her with it at once.

sdata.j: ↑今日↑↓きょう↓↑銀行↑↓ぎんこう↓からお↑金↑↓かね↓を↑引↑↓|ひ↓き↑出↑↓だ↓す|ことができない。
sdata.e: I can't get my money out of the bank today.
